item.title: 11 Years Old
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Still going strong, especially if there is a ball in front of her to chase.
item.content:encoded: Still going strong, especially if there is a ball in front of her to chase.

item.title: Open Space and Foothills in Colorado
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: I’ve been meaning to stop the car and take this photo for years; finally did it. I might try it again with more focus on the broken down stone structure on the left side.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been meaning to stop the car and take this photo for years; finally did it. I might try it again with more focus on the broken down stone structure on the left side.

item.title: Open Space Fence
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: I liked the fence here – ended up being right next to where we parked by the side of the road.
item.content:encoded: I liked the fence here – ended up being right next to where we parked by the side of the road.

item.title: It’s Top Down Weather
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: This was from a drive at the end of January; I thoroughly enjoyed getting to put the top down in 2015 long before I expected to. It’s warm and beautiful in Denver this week as well – I am not complaining.
item.content:encoded: This was from a drive at the end of January; I thoroughly enjoyed getting to put the top down in 2015 long before I expected to. It’s warm and beautiful in Denver this week as well – I am not complaining.

item.title: Photos from Maine
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: I took a few photos in Maine during our extended weekend stay post-Monktoberfest. We stayed at an awesome 1800’s farmhouse that had been nicely renovated; had a fantastic house concert from Liz Longley, and visited Fort Popham.
item.content:encoded: I took a few photos in Maine during our extended weekend stay post-Monktoberfest. We stayed at an awesome 1800’s farmhouse that had been nicely renovated; had a fantastic house concert from Liz Longley, and visited Fort Popham.

item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: This view never gets old.
item.content:encoded: This view never gets old.

item.title: Legg Hoarn
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Seattle has some awesome old houses.
item.content:encoded: Seattle has some awesome old houses.

item.title: Walking Through my Childhood
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: My parents still live in the same house in Seattle that I was raised in. I’m in town visiting them this week and this morning took a walk through the neighborhood. Lots of things haven’t changed much in the last 20 years.
item.content:encoded:
My parents still live in the same house in Seattle that I was raised in. I’m in town visiting them this week and this morning took a walk through the neighborhood.

Lots of things haven’t changed much in the last 20 years.

item.title: Camping at Golden Gate State Park
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: No, not that Golden Gate – it’s a state park near Golden, Colorado. We spent a weekend camping there a few weeks back – beautiful area. Here are a few photos.
item.content:encoded:
No, not that Golden Gate – it’s a state park near Golden, Colorado.

We spent a weekend camping there a few weeks back – beautiful area. Here are a few photos.

item.title: WordCamp Miami
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: More than a little overdue, but better late than never – here are some photos from WordCamp Miami 2014. The full set is up on Flickr.
item.content:encoded: More than a little overdue, but better late than never – here are some photos from WordCamp Miami 2014. The full set is up on Flickr.

item.title: The Park

item.description: We had a gorgeous day to walk to our local park this past weekend.
